verses.roman:
tabe ta' karilā prabhu dakṣiṇa gamana
kūrma-kṣetre kaila vāsudeva vimocana

synonyms: tabe ta'-thereafter; karilā—did; prabhu—Lord Caitanya Mahāprabhu; dakṣiṇa—to southern India; gamana—traveling; kūrma-kṣetre—at the pilgrimage site known as Kūrma-kṣetra; kaila—did; vāsudeva—of the name Vāsudeva; vimocana—deliverance.
translation: After bestowing mercy upon Sārvabhauma Bhaṭṭācārya, the Lord started for southern India. When He came to Kūrma-kṣetra, He delivered a person named Vāsudeva.
